name: Xcode Project Data File
summary: Learn about .MODE2V3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MODE2V3 files are located in your .XCODEPROJ package, along with a .PBXUSER and .PBXPROJ file. The MODE2V3 file is named after your username, e.g., username.mode2v3.

description: File used by Xcode, a software development application for Mac OS X; referenced by Xcode when multiple users work on the same Xcode project; stores user-specific settings, such as the size of the project window and the selected items in a project; similar to the .MODE1V3 file.
